projectName: Multi-Tenant SaaS Platform - Project & Task Management System
projectDescription: A production-ready multi-tenant SaaS application enabling multiple organizations to independently register, manage their teams, create projects, and track tasks with complete data isolation and role-based access control.
features: Multi-tenancy with row-level data isolation (Shared Database + Shared Schema approach)
Three-tier Role-Based Access Control (super_admin, tenant_admin, user)
JWT-based stateless authentication with 24-hour token expiration
Subscription management with three plans (Free: 5 users/3 projects, Pro: 25 users/15 projects, Enterprise: 100 users/50 projects)
Complete data isolation between tenants at application and database levels
User management with role assignment and deactivation
Task management with status tracking and priority levels
Responsive React frontend with 6 main pages
Password hashing with bcrypt (10 salt rounds)

notes.multiTenancy: Uses Shared Database + Shared Schema approach for cost efficiency and simplicity. Row-level isolation achieved through automatic tenant_id filtering at application layer.
notes.scalability: Optimized for 100s of tenants. For 1000s of tenants, consider implementing schema-per-tenant approach with connection pooling.
notes.security: Production deployment requires: HTTPS/TLS, stronger JWT secret, environment-specific configurations, rate limiting, and database backups.
notes.performance: Includes database indexes on frequently queried columns (tenant_id, status, user_id). Consider implementing caching for read-heavy operations.
notes.extensibility: Architecture supports adding features like: real-time notifications, advanced reporting, API rate limiting, two-factor authentication, and SSO integration.
